Question.Subject: At&T Internet is slow!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!?
Question.Content: okay so my internet is so slow.....the download speed is only around 20-80 kbps max. i dont know which internet plan i have so could you tell? we have a motorola modem from at&t and a netgear router can someone tell me why its maybe slow? answer the questions and ill give u best answer fail idiot learn to fucking answer the question
Question.ChosenAnswer:
If your PC is running slow and you want to make it faster, I recommend you to check your pc heath online first, then you can know why it is slow and fix easily..
Recommended website: <--http://slowpc-checking.com/Slow_PC
